game.name: Street Fighter V
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Street Fighter® V로 강렬한 정면 승부를 경험해보세요! 16명의 대표 캐릭터 중에서 고르고, 각양각색의 탄탄한 매치 옵션으로 온라인이나 오프라인에서 친구들과 겨뤄보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the intensity of head-to-head battles with Street Fighter® V! Choose from 16 iconic characters, then battle against friends online or offline with a robust variety of match options.

reviewHighlights.text: While this is not the current iteration of the franchise and thus not relevant for esports and competitive anymore, it is still a great fighting game...
